entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:47 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 12:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: S 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of wet snow mixed with rain beginning near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:37 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain changing to snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 8:37 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 8:37 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
